description.narrative: Output 009- Nutrition Policy and Data: Systems in place for development and implementation of evidence-based and equity-focused national nutrition policy and strategic plan

mailing-address.narrative: 4-8 Rangoon Close Ward 24 P.O. Box 5051 Cantoments Accra

sector.narrative: Breastfeeding protection, promotion and support (including work on Code)
Capacity building for nutrition preparedness and response
Data, research, evaluation, evidence generation, synthesis, and use for prevention of stunting and other forms of malnutrition
National multisectoral strategies and plans to prevent stunting (excludes intervention-specific strategies)
Technical assistance - Maternal and newborn health
Technical assistance - Treatment of severe acute malnutrition
Vitamin A supplementation in early childhood (children under 5)

description.narrative: Development Partner affairs Technical staff services

title.narrative: Ghana United Nations Development Assistance Framework
Ghana Country Programme Document 2012-2016 Results Matrix
UNICEF Contract Awards through the UN Global Marketplace
Ghana 2019 Annual Report on Results for Children
Ghana Country Office 2020 Annual Report on Results for Children
UNICEF Tender Notices through the UN Global Marketplace

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Output 009- Nutrition Policy and Data: Systems in place for development and implementation of evidence-based and equity-focused national nutrition policy and strategic plan

description.narrative: UNICEF-Ghana continued to engage with development partners on Scaling Up Nutrition in Ghana, linked with the First Lady's initiative on reducing malnutrition and malaria in priority populations, leveraged high level support for launching nutrition programmes and supported the first national micronutrients survey to inform future planning and programmes. | Status:Met | As-of Date:29/12/2017

title.narrative: Number of districts implementing new system for monitoring implementation of key interventions in the nutrition strategic plan

actual.value: 2017:All 216 districts were oriented and are implementing. However there is a need for close supervision and validation of data

title.narrative: Percentage of health facilities that provide treatment services for the management of SAM
Policy and action plan available and being implemented in at least 4 most deprived regions

baseline.value: No policy or action plan available

actual.value: 2017:National Nutrition Policy was finally launched by health Minister in July 2016

title.narrative: National or local Nutrition sector plans integrate risk management strategies addressing risks related to disasters, climate change, conflict, public health emergencies or other crises
Baseline for iron and folic acid supplementation in Northern and Volta Regions established

target.value: 2017:Baseline for Iron and Folic supplementation for Northern and Volta Regions available

actual.value: 2017:A total of 60 schools (30 each in Northern and Volta regions) participated in the baseline data collection. Haemoglobin and malaria tests were conducted, heights and weights taken, and individual questionnaires administered to 1636 respondents.

baseline.value: Reports of micronutrients assessments not available

actual.value: 2017:Survey report available. Plans ongoing to disseminate to key players in first quarter of 2018.
